#include<stdio.h>
//using namespace std;
int main(){
int a,b,res;
scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
while(a||b){res=0;
while(a&&b){
    if(a%10+b%10>9)
        res++;
    a/=10;b/=10;
}
switch(res){
case 0:printf("No carry operation.\n");break;
case 1:printf("1 carry operation.\n");break;
default:printf("%d carry operations.\n",res);
 }
 scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
 }return 0; }
